Test all of the values of text-justify for 8bits characters
This test checks that all of the values for text-justify property works properly for 8bits characters.
Every block has been set as 'text-align: justify' and 'text-align-last: start'.

text-justify: auto
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor.

text-justify: none
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor.

text-justify: inter-word
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor.

text-justify: distribute
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor.
